body.script: /* Must be below squarespace-headers */(function(){var touchTest="ontouchstart"in window||navigator.msMaxTouchPoints;if(!touchTest){with(document.documentElement){className=className.replace(new RegExp("touch-styles"),"")}}})()

div.class: sqs-block html-block sqs-block-html sqs-col-6 span-6 float float-right

h3.strong: Due to the large concerns surrounding the COVID-19 pleas read the following notification provided by the Maricopa County Department of Public Health:

div.p: If you have any questions, please contact us at mesdhealth@msdaz.org﻿

strong.em: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)
Important update for the Murphy Elementary School District
Letter from Governor Ducey and Superintendent Hoffman (English)
Letter from Governor Ducey and Superintendent Hoffman (Spainsh)
Positive support for all of our students, families and our community
